title: Affidavits and sworn statements
dataVerified: Affiant name, address, statement details, notary name, notarization date, jurisdiction
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Legal document format for court proceedings. Tamper-evident verification prevents alteration of sworn statements. Domain binding to notary or court jurisdiction ensures authenticity. Critical for legal proceedings where sworn statements are key evidence. Prevents perjury and document fraud in litigation.
